attributes.action: order the Bank of England immediately to remove the Banking Services Licence of Barclays Bank.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all of us taxpayers having no say in whether or not we should be bailing out banks failing because of bad decisions to then have our noses rubbed into the trough by bankers WE ARE SUBSIDING jetting off to a lavish party at a luxury villa somewhere outside of the UK is indicative of the disdain in which we are held by them.  Take their financial services licence off them immediately.  Transfer all the assets to NSandI and let them bail themselves out.
